contents.text: Thank you for calling After College in San Francisco, connecting talented graduates directly with the employers who want to hire you.
If you are an employer looking to recruit college talent, press 1.
To post a new job listing on our marketplace, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our job posting support team.

navigationGoals: I need to post a new job opening for a data analyst role right away.
I want to post a new job listing on the marketplace for my veteran-led business.
I need to publish a new job requisition via your job-posting support.
I need help posting a new job opening; I’m not sure how to complete the listing form.
Post a listing for a part-time undergraduate research assistant position in my physics lab.

contents.text: To learn about enterprise solutions and pricing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our enterprise solutions consultant.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for enterprise package pricing and features for bulk hiring.
I’d like information on enterprise hiring solutions and pricing for my company.
I want to get enterprise-tier pricing and API integration details.
Could you explain your enterprise hiring solutions and their pricing options to me?
Get pricing details for our university physics department’s enterprise recruiting package.

contents.text: If you are a recent graduate or student seeking opportunities, press 2.
To create or update your candidate profile, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our profile management team.

navigationGoals: Please help me update my candidate profile with my latest graduation and internship details.
I need to create or update my candidate profile to highlight my military background.
I need to update my candidate profile with my latest project portfolio.
I’m trying to create or update my candidate profile and need assistance with the details.
Update my candidate profile to highlight my quantum mechanics research experience.

contents.text: To speak with a career specialist for guidance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a career specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a career specialist for quick resume and job-search advice.
I want to speak with a career specialist about transitioning my military skills to civilian roles.
I want to connect with a career specialist for technical interview coaching.
I’d like to speak with a career specialist for guidance on my job search.
Speak with a career specialist about applying to graduate programs in physics.
